author: andschwa
body: The custom native host is currently required due to PowerShell's Assembly Load Context, where we have to initialize it on the start of PowerShell.  However, it should be possible to make an initialization function that can instead be called in managed main, and thus remove the local shell's need to use a custom host.  VSO create date - 12/17/2015 11:57:00     VSO closed date - 12/23/2015 16:54:00
title: Remove dependency on custom native host for local shell
